channel.title: Please help Will rep++
channel.description: Okay soim using a crisisx remake, and when i go into the source files, theres no wher for the ip to go. i ahve searched 127.0.0.1 ive searched 0.0.0.0 ive searched no-ip, nothing comes up, but when i change the ip in the client, and i try to connect it doesnt work, so i change the ip in the client to 127.0.0.1, and it works, its connecting as local host but theres no place to change the ip in the source.. pease help..

item.title: Please help Will rep++
item.dc:creator: @bigballers bigballers
item.description:
@bigballers wrote:

What is the error you are getting?

Have you portforwarded?

It could also be that you have the port set different from the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help Will rep++
item.dc:creator: @Morgan_Linder Morgan Linder
item.description:
@Morgan_Linder wrote:

Thats what i thought, but when we try connecting we cant.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help Will rep++
item.dc:creator: @dawwn dawwn
item.description:
@dawwn wrote:

The Soul:

You don’t need to change the IP in the source.

The Ip is client-sided, of course.

Read full topic
